name: The Organic Route
description:
In ‘The Organic Route’ you play as a potted plant that has gained sentience after being genetically enhanced by a scientist.

Situated upon your creator’s desk, you must grow your roots to traverse the environment and find three batteries scattered throughout the apartment. Managing your energy supply, you can move, climb and bridge your way across obstacles and, once you have found all three batteries, overload the electric lock and escape through the door!

This game was made during the Global Game Jam 2023 at the Falmouth University jam site.


3rd Party Assets sourced from:

  • Quixel Bridge 
  • Turbo Squid
  • Unreal Marketplace
